gameDetails.name: Agricola: Ã–-Deck
gameDetails.description:
The "Ö-Deck" brings 24 new cards for Agricola. Theme of this expansion is Austria (Österreich, that's why it is called Ö-Deck). Visitors of the gameplay festival in Vienna 2008 were able to get one copy of only 3000 printed in German. The cards were later also printed in English (quantities unknown).

The Ö-Deck brings 12 new occupation cards and 12 new minor improvement cards.

It was included in Agricola: The Goodies Expansion

Expands:

     Agricola
